# 视图及组件模板

---

```js

<!--
 * @Author: []
 * [名称 | 描述]
 *
-->
<template>
  <根 class="组件名称" ></根>
</template>

<script>
export default {
  name: '组件名称',
  // mixins: [],
  // props: {},
  data () {
    return {
      
    }
  }
  
  // computed: {},

  // watch: {},

  // beforeCreate () {},

  // created () {},

  // beforeMount () {},

  // mounted () {},

  // beforeUpdate () {},

  // updated () {},

  // beforeDestroy () {},

  // destroyed () {},

  // methods: {}
}
</script>

<style lang="less" scoped>
.组件名称 {

}
</style>

```
